name: robinsonai-mcp-servers
description: Comprehensive MCP servers for Vercel, Neon, Redis, GitHub, and more - by Robinson AI Systems

scripts.build:shared: pnpm -r --filter "@robinson_ai_systems/shared-*" run build && pnpm --filter "@robinson_ai_systems/robinsons-context-engine" run build && pnpm --filter "@robinson_ai_systems/free-agent-core" run build
scripts.build:mcp: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:free-agent-mcp && pnpm run build:paid-agent-mcp && pnpm run build:toolkit-mcp && pnpm run build:thinking-tools-mcp && pnpm run build:credit-optimizer-mcp
scripts.publish:free-agent-mcp: pnpm --filter @robinson_ai_systems/free-agent-mcp build && cd packages/free-agent-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:paid-agent-mcp: pnpm --filter @robinson_ai_systems/paid-agent-mcp build && cd packages/paid-agent-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:toolkit-mcp: pnpm --filter @robinson_ai_systems/robinsons-toolkit-mcp build && cd packages/robinsons-toolkit-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:thinking-tools-mcp: pnpm --filter @robinson_ai_systems/thinking-tools-mcp build && cd packages/thinking-tools-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:credit-optimizer-mcp: pnpm --filter @robinson_ai_systems/credit-optimizer-mcp build && cd packages/credit-optimizer-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:mcp: pnpm run publish:free-agent-mcp && pnpm run publish:paid-agent-mcp && pnpm run publish:toolkit-mcp && pnpm run publish:thinking-tools-mcp && pnpm run publish:credit-optimizer-mcp

author: Robinson AI Systems
